text: Futhi khumbula ngesikhathi u-Abrahamu ethi “Nkosi yami enza lendawo ibe yindawo ephephile futhi wondle abantu bayo ngezithelo noma ngabe ngubani okholelwa kuMvelinqangi nasosukwini lokugcina wathi (uMvelinqangi), “noma ngabe ubani ongakholwa ngizomnika injabulo yesikhashana bese ngimdudulela ekujezisweni komlilo futhi sibi leso siphetho”
